text: As for his words, and I know from God what you do not know, is an allusion to the fact that the intellect knows that the heart will soon return to the world of creatures and will halt with habit after having been to the Side of the Truth and having separated from the rule of habit, similar to the question once posed: 'What is the end·∏ç', to which it was said, 'It is to return to the beginning'.
